MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK14 postcode area of Dollar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.30pm to repair faulty equipment in Lovers Loan and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:09PM on Friday 22 January 2021.
